## Obrazek

```{r,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE,error=FALSE,echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
data(iris)
mutate(iris, Sepal.Length = Sepal.Length/max(Sepal.Length),
       Sepal.Width = Sepal.Width/max(Sepal.Width)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point()

```

## Tabelka

```{r}
knitr::kable(iris)
```
